Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with wide mouth, rounded rim and stable base with convex bottom. Paste of an ochre colour and  interior and exterior surface with reddish-coloured coating. The exterior presents a decoration consisting of vertical lines or bands in white and demarcated in black, running from the rim to the base of the piece.
